unalcol.types.real.array

Class DoubleArrayPlainWrite

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.io.Write<double[]>
      • unalcol.types.real.array.DoubleArrayPlainWrite

  • public class DoubleArrayPlainWrite
extends unalcol.io.Write<double[]>

    Title: DoubleArraySimplePersistent

    Description: A double array persistent method that uses a given charater for separating the array values

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2009

    Company: Kunsamu

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez Perdomo
